meanings.definition: To make someone familiar with someone or something again.
meanings.sent1: After years apart, the class reunion reacquaints old friends.
meanings.sent2: She reacquaints herself with the city after being away for so long.
meanings.sent3: The book character reacquaints with their forgotten past in a surprising twist.
meanings.sent4: Traveling to new places reacquaints you with the beauty of the world.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh flowers reacquaints me with memories of my childhood garden.

meanings.definition: To renew a previous acquaintance or familiarity.
meanings.sent1: The high school reunion reacquaints classmates who haven't seen each other in years.
meanings.sent2: He reacquaints himself with his favorite childhood book every summer.
meanings.sent3: The cat reacquaints with its old toy, batting it around the room joyfully.
meanings.sent4: The melody of the song reacquaints me with the feelings of nostalgia.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh cookies baking reacquaints me with the warmth of home.
